subject: Amendment in the Standard EPC Agreement for considering maintenance payment exclusive of GST and reimbursement of GST at applicable rates - reg.
text: HRal 75y TTHFf 9iferasrut (Tew5 9Raev &r RTHPf TART4, YRTT TRGT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Frqta TT 6f-5 Qa 6, #z7-10, E1WT, 78f @oaft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TM/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Standard Document/2o22 Policy Circular No_ 11.40/2022 dated 4th July, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No_ NHAI/11033/CGM(FA)-SNN/2020-21/GSTonRoadContracts (Computer No: 54488)} Sub:: Amendment in the Standard EPC Agreement for considering maintenance payment exclusive of GST and reimbursement of GST at applicable rates- reg: In EPC projects Contract price put to tender is exclusive of GST and as per Article 14.1 maintenance amount is calculated as percentage of contract price: 2 In view of above, as Contract Price is exclusive of GST the maintenance payment shall also be exclusive of GST. Accordingly, it has been decided to modify Article 14.1 of Standard EPC Agreement as under: Clause Existing Clause Modified Clause No Article 14.1 Above amount for the performance Above amount for the performance of of Contractors' Maintenance Contractors' Maintenance   obligations obligations shall inclusive of all shall be, inclusive of all taxes (except taxes. The amount   payable for GST which shall be payable at maintenance shall be adjusted to applicable rates). The amount payable reflect any increase or decrease for maintenance shall be adjusted to arising out of variation in WPI to be reflect any increase or decrease arising determined in accordance with the out of variation in WPI to be provisions of Clause 19.12. It is determined in accordance with the further agreed that the Contract provisions of Clause 19.12. It is further Price hereunder shall be reckoned agreed that the Contract Price with reference to the amount hereunder shall be reckoned with Contd_.2 Mt 7 7 91 NHAL be,
